## Summary

- What does this PR change?

## Type

- [ ] feature (feature/* -> develop)
- [ ] hotfix (hotfix/* -> main, then back-merge to develop)
- [ ] release (release/* -> main, then back-merge to develop)
- [ ] other (explain)

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch naming follows GitFlow (`feature/*`, `hotfix/*`, `release/*`)
- [ ] PR target branch is correct (`develop` for features, `main` for hotfix)
- [ ] Tests updated/added if needed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
